description.value: ValueSet IMMZD2DTHPVSingleDose for IMMZ.D2.DT.HPV.Single dose. Business rule: Determine if the client is due for a human papillomavirus (HPV) vaccination according to the national immunization schedule Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any Table: Alternative single-dose schedule
